title: Roundel, 4th–5th century
medium:
Medium: warp; S-spun linen. Wefts; S-spun linen, S-spun wools.
Technique: slit tapestry with supplementary weft wrapping.
description: Polychrome vases, plant and flower forms facing in four different directions.

tombstone.epitaph:
Roundel, 4th–5th century.
4th–5th century. Medium: warp; S-spun linen. Wefts; S-spun linen, S-spun wools.
Technique: slit tapestry with supplementary weft wrapping.. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-78.
